structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Annual salaries of certain county officers.
law.text: The county judge/executive, clerk, jailer who operates a full service jail, and sheriff shall each receive a monthly salary of one-twelfth (1/12) of the amount indicated by the salary schedule in KRS 64.5275.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 610, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 23, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 132, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 41; and ch. 17, sec. 21, effective January 1, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1, and ch. 254, sec. 5. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 1. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 1.
